name: Cactus
description:
Hey you!
Are you looking for small inexpensive platformer? Then I have a great solution for you!

«Cactus» is 2d pixel platformer about adventures of Cactus, whose owners forgot to water him, and now he must to survive at all costs!

=== Features ===
- At the moment there are 3 levels and tutorial, and this list will be replenished with time. 

- Levels are very hard (not recommended for amateurs of smashing their keyboards)

- The most part of objects is interactive.

- You can jump starting from the walls.

=== Contacts ===
